Gyroscope.summary: The Gyroscope interface of the Sensor APIs provides on each reading the angular velocity of the device along all three axes.

remarks.para: To use this sensor, the user must grant permission to the 'gyroscope' device sensor through the Permissions API. In addition, this feature may be blocked by a Permissions Policy set on your server.

GyroscopeX.summary:
The x read-only property of the
interface returns a number specifying the
angular velocity of the device along its x-axis.

GyroscopeGyroscope.summary:
The Gyroscope() constructor
creates a new object which provides on each reading the
angular velocity of the device along all three axes.

GyroscopeZ.summary:
The z read-only property of the
interface returns a number specifying the
angular velocity of the device along its z-axis.

GyroscopeY.summary: The y read-only property of the interface returns a number specifying the angular velocity of the device along its y-axis.
